userRoles.title: User Roles
userRoles.restrictedUserRolesDescriptionPartOne: Selected user roles cannot be assigned by the
userRoles.restrictedUserRolesTooltip: Both Super Admin and People Admin can assign roles. Use this setting to specify which roles the People Admin cannot assign to employees for security purposes.
userRoles.successToastDescription: User role assignment restriction has been updated successfully.
userRoles.errorToastDescription: Failed to update the restriction. Please try again.
userRoles.recordClockInAndClockOut: Record Clock In and Clock Out
userRoles.accessAllDocuments: Access All Documents throughout the organization

times.title: Time Configurations
times.globalSettingsDescription: Define the standard working days, which will automatically reflect in all employee calendars
times.startOfTheWeekDescription: Select the starting day of your week
times.startOfAWorkDayDescription: Select the start time for your workday
times.numberOfWorkHoursInADayTitle: Number of work hours in a day
times.numberOfWorkHoursInADayDescription: Set the number of working hours per day
times.successToastDescription: Time Configuration has been updated successfully.
times.errorToastDescription: Failed to update the time configuration. Please try again.
times.leaveRequestRevokeModalDescription: Changing these working days to non-working days may revoke future leave requests for those dates. Are you sure you want to continue with these changes?
times.unsavedModalDescription: You are about to leave your current task, and any unsaved changes will be lost. Do you wish to resume your task or leave anyway?
times.emptyWorkingDaysErrorDescription: Setting up working days is required to save changes.
times.emptyStartOfWeekErrorTitle: Please set the start of the week
times.emptyStartOfWeekErrorDescription: Setting up start of the week is required to save changes.
